name: Ultrasound Spoof 2016: Pregnancy Test
description:
"I'm pregnant!"

LOL! The look on your mom's face is priceless! Prank your parents, friends, family, and coworkers with this awesome prank app. Add your name and hospital name to show your fake ultrasound and laugh until you cry at your friend's reaction!

Are you a dude? Well, use this app to show them your girlfriend is pregnant, or that girl you met a few months ago is...YIKES! LOL!
